entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add cartesian product/cross join methods to System.Linq #79944
  • Possible memory corruption issue in wasm #79943
  • NativeAOT and R2R support for TypeIdentifier #79941
  • [API Proposal]: #79939
  • Injected service is of wrong type when registered multiple times with generic registration - Microsoft.Extensions.DependecyInjection #79938
  • SignedCms: throws when manipulating certificates collection that contains a non-X.509 certificate #79935
  • [API Proposal]: Add overloaded methods for GetOrAdd, adding out parameters indicating if the key was added to the dictionary #79934
  • Attribute `foo` used in `[JsonPolymorphic(TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName = "foo")]` does not get deserialized #79933
  • Extend CA1310 to warn about Dictionary<string, T> and HashSet<string> #79932
  • NativeAOT cannot create generic type even if it is rooted using rd.xml #79930
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices version 7.0.0 not working in .NET 6 #79929
  • Unused struct fields sometimes improve the codegen #79928
  • Disappointing performance of abstract static interface methods #79927
  • TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider Decrypt lost data #79924
  • [API Proposal]: #79923

Closed

  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #28114
    Future
  • Host tests fail to restore on osx-arm64 #79470
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78457
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: `System.Boolean` should implement `System.IFormattable` #79942
  • TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests require 104GB free #77012
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 - Process terminated. Error while reaping child. errno = 10 #79540
  • NativeAOT symbols are broken on linux when publishing Release #77407
    7.0.x
  • Strength reduction for add operations performed power of 2 times #34938
    Future
  • [RyuJIT/ARM32] Lack of GTF_IND_UNALIGNED support #7970
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SignedCms certificate collection modification with attribute certificates #79940
    area-System.Security
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Make textual stack trace metadata smaller #79921
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Process.Unix: while reaping all processes, handle encountering direct children. #79817
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Extend ProcessStartInfo to allow setting LOGON_NETCREDENTIALS_ONLY #77637
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fixing compressed singlefile scenario on osx-arm64 #79894
    area-Single-File
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix condition for selecting build pools for official builds #79779
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move all of generic virtual method resolution to the type loader #79925
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Dispose underlying stream in TarReader.DisposeAsync() as well #79920
    area-System.IO
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-system-io #78935
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for @dotnet/area-extensions-filesystem #78954
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Fix size regression from enum sorting #79845
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Allow preinitializing types with canonical forms #79384
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Add support for JsonUnmappedMemberHandling #79945
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Add support for the Aho-Corasick algorithm in regexes. #71588
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, blocked, 8.0.0
  • [STJ SourceGen] Use Roslyn4.4 target when testing #79890
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json
  • Handle crash when [out] parameter of type Intptr* is passed to delegate #79763
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections
  • enable SslStream_AllowRenegotiation_False_Throws again #79914
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Disable outerloop tests on mono/mobile and fix timeout in sendtohelixhelp.proj #79885
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle `LCL_FLD_ADDR` in TreeLifeUpdater #79913
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow Base64Decoder to ignore space chars, add IsValid methods and tests #79334
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add NativeAOT checked leg #79847
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Decommit memory as needed #79912
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Sync ILLink to latest dotnet/linker commits #79918
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: LLVM version upgrade to v15 and opaque pointers #2138

Closed

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: assert in ssabuilder #2117
  • NativeAOT-LLVM: loop hoisting assert #2116

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Upgrade to LLVM v15 and opaque pointers #2139
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • Pass OfficialBuildId when building packages #2137

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge nativeaotruntime subset change #2136
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • warning NETSDK1004: Assets file '/root/.nuget/packages/system.threaing.tasks/4.3.0/ref/netstandard1.3/System.Threading.Tasks.xml not found #29659
  • Using PublishSingleFile and IncludeNativeLibrariesForSelfExtract on macOS causes a "Class PlaceholderObject is implemented in both" warning #29658

Closed

  • The dotnet pack doesn't work together with -p:NuspecProperties when multiple properties provided #29661

PullRequests

Created

  • Upgrade helix queues #29660
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add class templates #29655
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Adjust conditional params tests #29645
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-Templates
  • Move Template Discovery Test from dotnet/templating to dotnet/sdk #29628
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the macOs version #29644
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794
  • [Proposal]: Embedded Language Indicators for raw string literals #6247

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow up on changing OptionLogger telemetry key #66115
    17.6
  • "Replace property with method" shouldn't convert expression body to block body #66113
  • Roslyn unable to evaluate local variables on Windows Forms #66109

Closed

  • [Responsiveness] Further improve CSharpCommandLineParser.Parse() perf #66110
  • Add documentation for IDE0130 #65759
  • Capturing wrong variable in a local static function by using an extension method #65938
    17.5

PullRequests

Created

  • Qualify `Task.FromResult` when removing `async` modifier #66114
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66111
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add unique color scheme for high contrast mode #66082
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.6 #66108
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Option store #66069
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json #45744
  • Latest supported version on .NET Framework #45743
  • Blazor AsyncLocal is null on first re-render following hot reload #45741
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Provide diagnostic tools/means for Blazor server #45740
  • Perf regression: stage1publishaot #45739
  • Enable Playwright Offline PWA Tests #45736
    Backlog

Closed

  • Blazor change detection too liberal #13610
    Discussions
  • Edit Form Loses Focus with authorize view policy #45632
  • Perf improvement: mvc, stage1publishaot #45738

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Helix.Common.props #45737
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2072922 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Modernize Redis distributed cache #45735
  • Fix: Detect parsability when FromRoute attribute is used #45597
    area-infrastructure
  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
    area-blazor, feature-templates, playwright 🎭
  • Fix gRPC template tests #45702
    area-mvc, area-grpc

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Permission for Notifications #12291
  • Unfocus fixed except for scroll containers #12290
  • iOS: content page is showing flyout menu icon when back button is set to false in flyout pages app #12289
  • Width/Text rendering on Android Button with ImageSource when ContentLayout set to Top #12288
  • Can't set the app name in MacCatalyst project for macOS #12287
  • failed to prepare device for development. xcode 14.2, iOS 16.2 - Physical device #12286
  • Setting `Slider.Maximum` or `Slider.Minimum` resets binding of `Slider.Value` #12285
    Backlog
  • Label control's height does not increase dynamically. #12284
  • WebView do not ask permissions for Video and Mic #12283
  • GraphicsView Interaction Event must continue when outside #12282
  • SensorSpeed intervals are different on every platform (and some are too large) #12281
  • [Android,Windows]When the parent's IsEnabled Property is set to false, the touch of the child is getting triggered. #12278
  • First .NET MAUI demo does not display on screen #12277

Closed

  • Building in Release mode for Android results in a "The selected execution mode is not supported for .NET projects." error #12226
  • Pasting into MAUI text entry does not work on iOS #10302
    Backlog
  • Notes tutorial on macOS is blank #12166
  • I cannot access the Command Line arguments in Windows - MAUI #12246
  • Visual Studio Installer does not offer .NET Multi-platform App UI development workload #12251
  • Border does not occupy all the space in a grid cell #9081
    Backlog

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Essentials] Geolocation foreground listening #9572
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Update Essentials Preferences API Docs #12265
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when building bundle in Dockerfile #29927
  • Include( x => x.Child.OrderBy ) does not work in Postgresql #29925
  • Generate expression trees in compiled models (query filters, value converters) #29924
  • The host was aborted exception when adding new migration #29923

Closed

  • Log a warning when Ignore is called on an explicitly configured property or type #12082
    8.0.0
  • Support lazy and explicit loading from entities queried with NoTracking behavior #10042
    8.0.0
  • Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29513
    8.0.0
  • Maybe wrong literal mapping of SQL Server TimeSpan? #29922

PullRequests

Created

  • Flow query tracking behavior to materialization interceptor #29928
  • [release/7.0] Avoid circular dependency for unique indexes with null values #29921
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x

Merged

  • Warn when entity type, property, or navigation is ignored after being explicitly mapped #29926
  • Allow service properties typed as object #29919
  • Fix to #29513 - Json: improve projection deduplication for scenarios containing collection indexers #29808

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29920
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
